{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sylvania |model=SP5775 |fcc_date=11/27/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Junlan Electronic |type=wireless speaker system, audio streamer |fcc_id=OKUSP5775 |ic_id=10765A-SP5775 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB 2.0 Female Micro-B |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7688AN |cpu1_cspeed=575 |wi1_module=Linkplay A31 |wi1_module_if=module |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7688AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 Audio SoC;Beken;BK3254;BEKEN, BK3254QN48H, DG6428CH;1; |flags=Audio in (3.5mm), Alexa, battery backup, |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|WiFi Speaker with Amazon Alexa Voice}} :[http://legacy.curtisint.com/web/browser.asp?productID=SP5775&catName=STATBTSPK Product page]
"CAW-18057POWER-V1.0" is silkscreened on the LED board in the FCC photos. :"MT-WD6" is silkscreened on multiple boards in the FCC photos.
*[https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1-pcs-BK3254-Bluetooth-Module-4-1-F6888-Stereo-Audio-Module-FM-Radio-TF-Card-U/32761660485.html ''F6888 Bluetooth 4.1 Module (BK3254)'' on '''AliExpress'''] :[http://www.bekencorp.com/en/botong.asp?Parent_id=2&Class_id=8&Id=73 Beken BK3254 Bluetooth Audio Soc]
